issue.title: html search error
runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
issue.body: $ go version ``` go version go1.21.3 darwin/amd64 ``` $ cat go.mod|grep bleve ``` github.com/blevesearch/bleve/v2 v2.3.10 github.com/blevesearch/bleve_index_api v1.0.6 github.com/hktalent/bleve-mapping-ui v0.4.1 github.com/blevesearch/geo v0.1.18 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/go-porterstemmer v1.0.3 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/goleveldb v1.1.0 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/gtreap v0.1.1 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/mmap-go v1.0.4 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/scorch_segment_api/v2 v2.1.6 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/segment v0.9.1 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/snowballstem v0.9.0 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/stempel v0.2.0 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/upsidedown_store_api v1.0.2 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/vellum v1.0.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v11 v11.3.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v12 v12.3.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v13 v13.3.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v14 v14.3.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v15 v15.3.13 // indirect ``` save data: I don’t know what is special about this json data, which causes an exception to occur once it is queried after it is successfully saved, but the queries and operations of other indexes are correct. After many tests, as long as the following data is saved, the query will be abnormal. I infer that it may be caused by the presence of keys starting with _ ``` { "_contentLength": 57230, "_hasShrinkwrap": false, "_id": "myapp_51pwn@1.1.21", "_nodeVersion": "14.17.6", "_npmOperationalInternal": { "host": "s3://npm-registry-packages", "tmp": "tmp/myapp_51pwn_1.1.21_1638680987448_0.5999126432202129" }, "_npmUser": "51pwn.com ", "_npmVersion": "6.14.15", "_rev": "27-48641234539b2017b7f3b8fed714309d", "author": "51pwn.com", "bugs": { "url": "https://github.com/hktalent/myapp/issues" }, "dependencies": { "child_process": "^1.0.2", "compression": "^1.7.4", "express": "^4.17.1", "express-limiter": "^1.6.1", "helmet": "^4.6.0", "http-deceiver": "^1.2.7", "node-redis": "^0.1.7", "node-uuid": "^1.4.8", "redis": "^4.0.0", "socket.io": "^4.4.0", "socket.io-client": "^4.4.0", "socket.io-redis": "^5.4.0", "spdy": "^4.0.2", "uglify-js": "^3.14.4", "useragent": "^2.3.0" }, "description": "web app", "directories": {}, "dist-tags": { "latest": "1.1.21" }, "gitHead": "3a4a04b01181dae513466292eef1b04b27b6723f", "homepage": "https://github.com/hktalent/myapp#readme", "keywords": [ "web", "app" ], "license": "ISC", "main": "index.js", "maintainers": [ "51pwn.com " ], "name": "myapp_51pwn", "readmeFilename": "README.md", "repository": { "type": "git", "url": "git+https://github.com/hktalent/myapp.git" }, "scripts": { "test": "docker run --rm --name mywebapp-redis -d redis:6.2.6-alpine3.14 ; node --trace-deprecation test.js" }, "version": "1.1.21" } ``` query err: ``` 2023/10/24 18:04:24 [Recovery] 2023/10/24 - 18:04:24 panic recovered: POST /api/BBSec/_search HTTP/2.0 Host: 127.0.0.1:8081 Accept: application/json, text/plain, */* Accept-Encoding: br Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5 Content-Length: 97 Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8 Dnt: 1 Origin: https://127.0.0.1:8081 Referer: https://127.0.0.1:8081/indexes/BBSec/query?q=*&p=1 Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin comment.body: When I remove the underscore prefix from all keys, it becomes normal.

issue.title: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
issue.body: $ go version ``` go version go1.21.3 darwin/amd64 ``` $ cat go.mod|grep bleve ``` github.com/blevesearch/bleve/v2 v2.3.10 github.com/blevesearch/bleve_index_api v1.0.6 github.com/hktalent/bleve-mapping-ui v0.4.1 github.com/blevesearch/geo v0.1.18 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/go-porterstemmer v1.0.3 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/goleveldb v1.1.0 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/gtreap v0.1.1 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/mmap-go v1.0.4 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/scorch_segment_api/v2 v2.1.6 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/segment v0.9.1 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/snowballstem v0.9.0 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/stempel v0.2.0 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/upsidedown_store_api v1.0.2 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/vellum v1.0.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v11 v11.3.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v12 v12.3.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v13 v13.3.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v14 v14.3.10 // indirect github.com/blevesearch/zapx/v15 v15.3.13 // indirect ``` save data: I don’t know what is special about this json data, which causes an exception to occur once it is queried after it is successfully saved, but the queries and operations of other indexes are correct. ``` { "_contentLength": 57230, "_hasShrinkwrap": false, "_id": "myapp_51pwn@1.1.21", "_nodeVersion": "14.17.6", "_npmOperationalInternal": { "host": "s3://npm-registry-packages", "tmp": "tmp/myapp_51pwn_1.1.21_1638680987448_0.5999126432202129" }, "_npmUser": "51pwn.com ", "_npmVersion": "6.14.15", "_rev": "27-48641234539b2017b7f3b8fed714309d", "author": "51pwn.com", "bugs": { "url": "https://github.com/hktalent/myapp/issues" }, "dependencies": { "child_process": "^1.0.2", "compression": "^1.7.4", "express": "^4.17.1", "express-limiter": "^1.6.1", "helmet": "^4.6.0", "http-deceiver": "^1.2.7", "node-redis": "^0.1.7", "node-uuid": "^1.4.8", "redis": "^4.0.0", "socket.io": "^4.4.0", "socket.io-client": "^4.4.0", "socket.io-redis": "^5.4.0", "spdy": "^4.0.2", "uglify-js": "^3.14.4", "useragent": "^2.3.0" }, "description": "web app", "directories": {}, "dist-tags": { "latest": "1.1.21" }, "gitHead": "3a4a04b01181dae513466292eef1b04b27b6723f", "homepage": "https://github.com/hktalent/myapp#readme", "keywords": [ "web", "app" ], "license": "ISC", "main": "index.js", "maintainers": [ "51pwn.com " ], "name": "myapp_51pwn", "readmeFilename": "README.md", "repository": { "type": "git", "url": "git+https://github.com/hktalent/myapp.git" }, "scripts": { "test": "docker run --rm --name mywebapp-redis -d redis:6.2.6-alpine3.14 ; node --trace-deprecation test.js" }, "version": "1.1.21" } ``` query err: ``` 2023/10/24 18:04:24 [Recovery] 2023/10/24 - 18:04:24 panic recovered: POST /api/BBSec/_search HTTP/2.0 Host: 127.0.0.1:8081 Accept: application/json, text/plain, */* Accept-Encoding: br Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5 Content-Length: 97 Content-Type: application/json;charset=utf-8 Dnt: 1 Origin: https://127.0.0.1:8081 Referer: https://127.0.0.1:8081/indexes/BBSec/query?q=*&p=1 Sec-Fetch-Dest: empty Sec-Fetch-Mode: cors Sec-Fetch-Site: same-origin Te: trailers User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.15; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/118.0 runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference /usr/local/go/src/runtime/panic.go:261 (0x10004649d) panicmem: panic(memoryError) /usr/local/go/src/runtime/signal_unix.go:861 (0x10005fd64) sigpanic: panicmem() /Users/51pwn/MyWork/goSqlite_gorm/vendor/github.com/blevesearch/bleve/v2/index_impl.go:661 (0x101a4aaec) LoadAndHighlightFields: totalStoredFieldsBytes = doc.StoredFieldsBytes() /Users/51pwn/MyWork/goSqlite_gorm/vendor/github.com/blevesearch/bleve/v2/index_impl.go:611 (0x101a492a4) (*indexImpl).SearchInContext: err, storedFieldsBytes := LoadAndHighlightFields(hit, req, i.name, indexReader, highlighter) /Users/51pwn/MyWork/goSqlite_gorm/vendor/github.com/blevesearch/bleve/v2/index_impl.go:371 (0x101a4794d) (*indexImpl).Search: return i.SearchInContext(context.Background(), req) forkee.name: bleve
forkee.description: A modern text indexing library for go

commits.message: Discard searcher if nil (applicable to when building knn disjunct)

Allow KNN over multiple fields

+ Updated search request format.

issue.title: ANSI Windows Console Highlighting
issue.body:
Hello 

There is an issue in bleve match highlighting in windows, all my windows systems failed to correctly highlight the results except one win11 

I have taken some screenshots from the console output, I hope they help 


![image](https://github.com/blevesearch/bleve/assets/22593441/5d253059-9e92-406c-a502-852636b1bf1b)



![image](https://github.com/blevesearch/bleve/assets/22593441/d1e85920-7957-4d89-8900-c51371ff1f15)




![image](https://github.com/blevesearch/bleve/assets/22593441/bf46f8a5-8e76-4115-ac7e-ad5a5048bd5c)
